titles.title: Mount Naomi Wilderness Boundary Adjustment Act
A bill to make certain adjustments to the boundaries of the Mount Naomi Wilderness Area, and for other purposes.
Mount Naomi Wilderness Boundary Adjustment Act
Mount Naomi Wilderness Boundary Adjustment Act
Mount Naomi Wilderness Boundary Adjustment Act
Mount Naomi Wilderness Boundary Adjustment Act
Mount Naomi Wilderness Boundary Adjustment Act
Mount Naomi Wilderness Boundary Adjustment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 108-10.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici without amendment. With written report No. 108-23.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 38.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.
Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 108-253.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 143.

action.text: Mr. Bishop (UT) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 278.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on February 4, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Mount Naomi Wilderness Boundary Adjustment Act - Adjusts the boundary of the Mount Naomi Wilderness to: (1) exclude the approximately 31 acres of land depicted on the Map as "Land Excluded"; and (2) include the approximately 31 acres of land depicted on the Map as "Land Added."
